com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser

Class AbstractTokeniser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.AbstractTokeniser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tokeniser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleTokeniser

    public abstract class AbstractTokeniser
extends Object
implements Tokeniser
    An abstract tokeniser, applying filters correctly, but leaving actual tokenisation up to the implementation.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

      • tokeniseWithDecisions

        public List<TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence> tokeniseWithDecisions(String text)
        Description copied from interface: Tokeniser
        Tokenise a given sentence. More specifically, return up to N most likely tokeniser decision sequences, each of which breaks up the sentence into a different a list of tokens. Note: we assume duplicate white-space has already been removed from the sentence prior to calling the tokenise method, e.g. multiple spaces have been replaced by a single space.
        Specified by:
        tokeniseWithDecisions in interface Tokeniser
        Parameters:
        text - the sentence to be tokenised
        Returns:
        a List of up to n TokeniserDecisionTagSequence, ordered from most probable to least probable

      • tokeniseWithDecisions

        public List<TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence> tokeniseWithDecisions(Sentence sentence)
        Description copied from interface: Tokeniser
        Similar to Tokeniser.tokeniseWithDecisions(String), but the text to be tokenised is contained within a Sentence object.
        Specified by:
        tokeniseWithDecisions in interface Tokeniser

      • getTokenFilters

        public List<TokenFilter> getTokenFilters()
        Description copied from interface: Tokeniser
        Filters to be applied prior to breaking the sentence up into atomic token sequences - these filters will mark certain portions of the sentence as entire tokens, and the tokeniser will not take any decisions inside these. It still may join them to other atomic tokens, to create larger tokens.
        Specified by:
        getTokenFilters in interface Tokeniser

      • addTokenFilter

        public void addTokenFilter(TokenFilter filter)
        Description copied from interface: Tokeniser
